plot outline: Dolly Khambhatta and elderly women lives luxurious life and requires a governesses to take care of her after earlier one passed away. Patrick Sharma (Pat) her fiance person appoints Sheena even thou she doesn't meet the required age as he wants to woo her.Sheena loves Ricky and due to her work starts living with Khambhatta but it is revealed Ricky is estranged nephew of Khambhatta.Pat who hates Khambhatta finds that she has left him a property but he and Ricky are just scapegoats of a master plan in order to inherit Khambhatta's wealth.
title: Aksar 2
plot: A husband's plan to break up his marriage so that he can be with another woman backfires with unexpected consequences.

Dolly Khambhatta and elderly women lives luxurious life and requires a governesses to take care of her after earlier one passed away. Patrick Sharma (Pat) her fiance person appoints Sheena even thou she doesn't meet the required age as he wants to woo her.Sheena loves Ricky and due to her work starts living with Khambhatta but it is revealed Ricky is estranged nephew of Khambhatta.Pat who hates Khambhatta finds that she has left him a property but he and Ricky are just scapegoats of a master plan in order to inherit Khambhatta's wealth.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
